attributes.action: Licence the catching and recording of all seafish by anglers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long rod anglers have taken from the sea catches of seafish without the need to report the amount of fish they are catching.All UK
commercial fishermen and river authorities have to declair landings.With cod stocks it is important know what every fisherman,rod angler or commercial fisher are taking from the sea.Cod are returning to our grounds and it is important that they are protected in the future.
